casebody.data:
SHAPIRO, Appellant, v. STEUERWALD, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. February 28, 1894.) Appeal from fourth district court. Action by Leib Shapiro against Peter Steuerwald.

Argued before BISCHOFF and GIEGERICH, JJ.

M. J. Gretsch, for appellant. M. Strassman, for respondent.

■ No opinion. Judgment reversed, new trial ordered, with costs to appellant to abide the event
